api_list.name: check
api_list.description: Validates that the provided API token is valid.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sshscan-io.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sshscan-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sshscan-io.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/check"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sshscan-io.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
